Game works fine, but Russian text English audio. I found a different torrent, but there aren't alternatives on tpb. You have to go somewhere else for this ps2 game.
I cant install the game , can anyone help me ?
For those who don't believe in trial and error, this IS indeed both English and Russian. Simply chose the bottom option that first comes up when you boot the game to play in English.
